Kewl, just up the road a bit :)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kr=
istin Morris 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, February 14,=
 2009 2:43 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Hello



  Me!  I'm in Austin.
 =
 Kristin


----------------------------------------------------------------=
--------------

  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.com] On Behalf Of Larry Weinreich
  Sent: Saturday, February 14, 2009 12:0=
9 PM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Hello

  Th=
anks Margaret :)
    Anyone here from Texas?
            Larry

    ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
    From: itcdeadpeople 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.com 
    Sent: Friday, February 13, 2009 10:57 PM
    Subject: [EVP-ITC] R=
e: Hello

    Welcome Larry! :-)

    Margaret

    --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com, "Larry" <LWEINREICH@...> wrote:
    >
    > Hi Ya'll--
    > I'm n=
ew here but not to EVP recording or paranormal investigation. I 
    > run =
a small group here in San Antonio, Texas called TPI and I am also a 
    > =
member of 6th Sense Paranormal also here in San Antonio.
    > Larry
    >
=
